title: LTC3 — Facilities with Skilled 22 DD Beds — Data Dictionary (Draft)

license_number.description: Facility License Number (Section/Page: Sec I p.2)

fein.description: Facility FEIN Number (Section/Page: Sec I p.2)

admission_restrictions.description: Admission Restrictions (Section/Page: Sec I p.2) Multi-select; include None Applicable

fte_*.description: Staffing FTEs (Admin, Physicians, DON, RN, LPN, Certified Aides, Other Health, Other Non-Health, Total) (Section/Page: Sec I p.3) Total auto

admissions_initial.description: Initial admissions during 2023 (Section/Page: Sec I p.3)

discharges_permanent.description: Permanent discharges during 2023 (Section/Page: Sec I p.3)

census_dec31.description: Patients in facility on Dec 31, 2023 (Section/Page: Sec I p.3) Calculated per instructions
